tweet: Check out the latest Cardano Foundation newsletter. In this edition, we talk about the new staking website, Cardano's vision for Africa and Charles' panel discussion with Larry King:  https://t.co/Phw21wZ0XP

Last month, Cardano Foundation attended a crypto meetup in Warsaw, Poland with Duncan Coutts, Director of Engineering at IOHK. At the meetup, Duncan talked about Cardano's development. Watch his presentation here:  https://t.co/emP3kBdX8F
